title: How Do We Talk to Our Kids About School Shootings?
description:
You don’t grow, heal, or move forward unless you have hard conversations. Learn how as we talk to a parent who doesn’t know how to talk to their kids about school shootings, a wife who finally confronted her immature in-laws (this one is awesome), and a mom who doesn’t know if it’s wise to tell the kids their dad has become an atheist.
  How do we talk to our kids about school shootings?
 Follow-up call: my in-laws are not respecting our COVID boundaries
 Should we tell our daughter that her dad lost his faith?
 NutureShock: New Thinking About Children - Po Bronson & Ashley Merryman
